alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 5:12AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG NEAR WATERWAYS THIS MORNING... Web cams show that patchy dense fog is developing this morning near some creeks, streams, and marsh areas. The most impacted locations so far are around the Charleston area, especially where Interstate 526 crosses the Wando River and Cooper River. Other areas could be impacted through the morning before any lingering fog dissipates by 9 am. The fog could be locally dense, with visibilities less than half of a mile. Also, rapid changes in visibility over short distances on area roadways will be possible.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Tidal Berkeley
